name: Line It!
description:
Line It! is a local multiplayer game where up to 4 players will have to beat each other through amazing gamemodes to demostrate who is the most skilled player!!

The game is really easy, you just have to jump from node to node, trying to enclose your friends so as they can escape, or jump on to kill them. Furthermore, you will have a great amount of different abilities you could use to help you to win, escape or defeat your friends!!

The game include 4 different game modes and 7 amazing maps.

My idea is to still be adding new gamemodes and features to the game, so if I reach 50€ I will add new mechanics, maps, gamemodes... from the ones you propose in the comments :)

So you know, If you have any idea, or want some feature in the game, post it in the comments and if it's viable, I will add it to the game !!!
